synopsis.text: Each day, the digital realm of Gunpla Battle Nexus Online (GBN) becomes more immersive, offering sensory feedback for an increasingly realistic gaming experience. Two years have elapsed since the Build Divers clashed with the Coalition of Volunteers to safeguard the EL-Diver, and the game continues to evolve. In this ever-changing landscape, four distinct Divers tread their solitary paths. Hiroto, the lone mercenary, roams the Dimension; Kazami, the capricious wanderer, flits between parties; May, the enigmatic solo player, engages in relentless Gunpla battles; and Parviz, the introverted novice, yearns for cooperative play yet hesitates to take the plunge. Fate, however, has other plans, as these four lone wolves find themselves united under the banner of a new Build Divers team, embarking on a journey that promises an extraordinary experience beyond the confines of GBN.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
